SEO_DESCRIPTION: And He’s Funding Smart Real Estate Moves. If your deal makes sense, the money’s ready. I fund flips, rentals, and creative deals with real, asset-backed capital.
SEO_KEYWORDS: loans, personal loans, fast loans, online loans, cash loans, instant loans, loans with veraz, loans without veraz, loans with paycheck, loans without paycheck, loans with ID, loans without ID, loans with credit card, loans without credit card, loans with CBU, loans without CBU, loans with embargo, loans without embargo, loans with monotribute, loans without monotribute, loans with pensions, loans without pensions, loans with retirements, loans without retirements, loans with social plans, loans without social plans, loans with assignments, loans without assignments
HOME_DESCRIPTION: Hi, I’m Joel. I work with real capital, ready to be deployed. If you have a good deal -whether it’s a flip, a rental, or something more creative- I can help you fund it.
HOME_SUBTITLE: If your deal makes sense, the money’s ready. I fund flips, rentals, and creative deals with real, asset-backed capital. No banks, no drama, just solutions that close fast.
FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Joel's money is a personal loan company that offers financial solutions to its customers.

FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_1_DESCRIPTION: Click on 'Request a Loan' and tell us about the project you want to finance.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_2_DESCRIPTION: Make sure all the information is clear and accurate.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_3_DESCRIPTION: In less than 24 hours you will receive a response by email if your application has potential.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_4_DESCRIPTION: If your deal qualifies, you will receive an offer directly to your email.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_5_DESCRIPTION: You accept, complete documents, we do the appraisal and move to underwriting.
FEATURES.FEATURES_ITEM_6_DESCRIPTION: Our team will handle the title and insurance. We will contact you if anything is missing to close.

CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Access real capital to make it happen. Flips, rentals, deposits… whatever you need to close.
TESTIMONIALS_DESCRIPTION: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers have to say about their experience with our platform.

TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: Excellent service and speed in delivering the loan.
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: Very good service and excellent customer service.
TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION_3: Very good service and excellent customer service.

OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_1: We lend you the initial money to secure the deal while you close the negotiation. Ideal if you need to act fast and don’t want to miss the opportunity.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_2: Fast Approvals: Receive your funds in just 48 to 72 hours.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_3: No Credit Check Needed: Your credit score won’t impact your approval.
OPTION_1_LIST.OPTION_1_4: No Income Docs Required: Skip the paperwork — no income verification necessary.

OPTION_2_LIST.OPTION_2_1: Used when you need to do two closings in one transaction. You buy and resell almost at the same time, without using your own money.

OPTION_3_LIST.OPTION_3_1: Loan to buy, fix, and resell a property in a short time.

OPTION_4_LIST.OPTION_4_1: For properties you will rent out that pay for themselves with monthly rent.

OPTION_5_LIST.OPTION_5_1: Direct capital. No banks. No slow processes. Fast, simple, and designed to make things happen.

FOOTER_TITLE: What type of deals do we finance?
FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: We fund flips, rentals, and creative deals with real, asset-backed capital—no banks, no delays. If your numbers work, the funds move. Fast decisions. Straightforward solutions. Closed.
READY_TO_APPLY_DESCRIPTION: Complete the loan application form and get your personal loan on the spot.
FORM_CONTACT_MESSAGE: Tell us more about your project
FORM_INFO_TITLE: We'd Love to Hear From You
FORM_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Have questions about our platform or need help getting started? Our team is here to assist you every step of the way.
FORM_MODAL_MESSAGE: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
FORM_QUESTION_1: What type of loan are you interested in?
FORM_QUESTION_1_TEXT: Please select the type of loan you are interested in.
FORM_QUESTION_2: What is the purpose of the loan?
FORM_QUESTION_2_TEXT: Please provide a brief description of the purpose of the loan.
